textContent:
First of all you're not allowed to feel that way ğŸ˜’
But then again if you're here then you're going through that feeling which makes me really upset ğŸ˜•

I wish I could show you how perfect you're in many ways, you ask what do I like in you, right? 
So I've had male classmates/friends/colleagues all my life and I've had interaction, after most of the conversation which I've had left me wondering "seriously yeh aise sochta hai!?", and till date there hasn't been a single conversation which made me feel like that about you even though when we both come from different cultural backgrounds, have different set of upbringing yet you always gave me the vibes, I always wanted in my partner ğŸ¤§ 

Not just that, you're so well behaved ğŸ˜­ you've never raised your voice infront of me, you're such a sweetheart ğŸ˜­ğŸ©·

Have you seen yourself!!? Your eyess ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ they're the prettiest eyes I've ever seen ğŸ˜­ your voice toh ufff ğŸ˜­ I'm literally in love with your voice ğŸ¥º 
Your hairs, your lips, your smile ğŸ˜­ğŸ©· you even got a perfect nose and still you have the audacity to say "bs awein kehti hai aap" ğŸ¥¹ğŸ˜

I don't know about others but you're perfect to me! yes I do get angry but that doesn't mean that I stopped seeing you that way ğŸ˜­ 
I love you so much you're the best and your mommy's so proud of you babyboi! ğŸ¤§ğŸ«£
title: Open when you're feeling insecure.
textContentHtml:
First of all you're not allowed to feel that way ğŸ˜’

But then again if you're here then you're going through that feeling which makes me really upset ğŸ˜•


I wish I could show you how perfect you're in many ways, you ask what do I like in you, right? 

So I've had male classmates/friends/colleagues all my life and I've had interaction, after most of the conversation which I've had left me wondering "seriously yeh aise sochta hai!?", and till date there hasn't been a single conversation which made me feel like that about you even though when we both come from different cultural backgrounds, have different set of upbringing yet you always gave me the vibes, I always wanted in my partner ğŸ¤§ 


Not just that, you're so well behaved ğŸ˜­ you've never raised your voice infront of me, you're such a sweetheart ğŸ˜­ğŸ©·


Have you seen yourself!!? Your eyess ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ they're the prettiest eyes I've ever seen ğŸ˜­ your voice toh ufff ğŸ˜­ I'm literally in love with your voice ğŸ¥º 

Your hairs, your lips, your smile ğŸ˜­ğŸ©· you even got a perfect nose and still you have the audacity to say "bs awein kehti hai aap" ğŸ¥¹ğŸ˜


I don't know about others but you're perfect to me! yes I do get angry but that doesn't mean that I stopped seeing you that way ğŸ˜­ 

I love you so much you're the best and your mommy's so proud of you babyboi! ğŸ¤§ğŸ«£
